content: You are right , “ You might wanna take a long hard look in the mirror and see if the person looking back at you is the kind of person you want to be “ Just take a step back and look at the what you are doing to reach where you wanna be . If you are searching for the one person that will change your life is to take a look at the mirror. I agree with you , Remember the person who made a difference in this world, in others life . Loved reading your Post.
